Job Description:  Responsible for monitoring and managing monthly and annual tax declaration of the Group Reconcile Monthly Tax Returns at year end for annual tax preparation Reconcile import declaration and purchases on monthly and yearly basis Regularly monitor the tax compliance in the group to ensure tax law and regulations are implemented and complied Deal with tax officer/tax auditors for Desk, Limited and Comprehensive Audit Review all document requirement before submitting to tax auditor Prepare documents for auditors by working with Finance and Accounting team Check and consult with tax officer/auditor/tax consulting firm if any new case to be dealt with and discussed with senior management On-going support to finance and other relevant departments in terms of tax technical support and advice on day-to-day work Lead to deal with and work out in terms of compliance review, assessment etc., Monitor the updates on the Cambodia tax law and regulations to identify and mitigate tax risks of the group Provide tax knowledge updates to tax team Submit audited FS/TOI upon ministries’ requirement Other relevant tasks assigned by management
Job Requirement:  Bachelor’s Degree in accounting or related field. A minimum of 5 years’ experience in related fields. In-depth knowledge of accounting and bookkeeping processes. - In-depth knowledge of Cambodia Tax Law. Tax agent certificate is preferably. Good understanding of MS Office and accounting software. Must able to communicate in English Strong attention to detail with excellent analytical skills. Be patience, flexible, honest and friendly

Job Requirement: - Good command of spoken and written English and Chinese. - Unlimited experienceWork day: 6days Per Week | Time: 09 :00am to 06：00pm- Paid Holidays: Following the Sub – Decree of Royal Government- Sick Leave: Following the labor law of Cambodia                                    - Allowance for meal: 50$ Per Month- Allowance of transportation: 20$ Per Mount - Allowance of Phone: 10$ per  Mount - Annual Leave:	Following the Labor law of Cambodia (18days/a year)- Seniority payment: Following the Labor law of Cambodia Vocational Training- NSSF insurance: Following the Labor law of CambodiaWork Location: Phnom Penh, Pursat, Bavet, Kapmong Cham and Sihanoukville
Company Profile:
CAMHR is Cambodia’s leading human resources and recruitment company, specializing in providing human capital resources and assets. Launched in 2009 by CAMHR INFORMATION (CAMBODIA) CO. LTD, we have grown from specializing in online recruitment to offline, sourcing employees of all standards for businesses and organizations across the country. 

Through our dedicated team of internationally-trained experts, we combine state-of-the-art technology, data analysis and a comprehensive network of partners to find the right person for your business. Calling on our well-established network of potential candidates, we conduct the screening process, saving your company time while ensuring you secure the perfect person to help your business grow. 

Our success and expertise has led to thousands of jobseekers using our services every month to search the more than 5,000 live job ads, and our shift to focus on providing companies with a tool to recruit the best staff possible has seen CAMHR become Cambodia’s elite recruitment agency.
